concept.title: DITA-OT pre-processing architecture
concept.shortdesc: This topic describes the set of steps commonly known as the pre-processing stage of a DITA build. These steps typically run at the start of any build using the DITA-OT, regardless of the final output format.

conbody.p: Each step described corresponds to one Ant target in the build pipeline. The general Ant target "preprocess" will call all of the targets described here.
